body_html:
if you you could produce this in a Debian docker image, that'd be easily reproducible on my side and i can look further.

You can run docker with debian/jessie with the command:

docker run -it --ipc=host --rm -v $(pwd):/remote debian:jessie bash

The current working directory is mounted at /remote.

Let me know if you can reproduce it in that environment, with the commands you ran in that environment.

body:
if you you could produce this in a Debian docker image, that'd be easily reproducible on my side and i can look further.

You can run docker with debian/jessie with the command:

```
docker run -it --ipc=host --rm -v $(pwd):/remote debian:jessie bash
```

The current working directory is mounted at `/remote`.

Let me know if you can reproduce it in that environment, with the commands you ran in that environment.
